content.question: According to the passage, which of the following explains how agricultural groups would be affected by an Obrador victory?

choices.label: Agricultural groups would be more likely to be responsive to citizensâ€™ demands.
Agricultural groups would be less likely to receive state subsidies from the national government.
Agricultural groups would be less independent from the state.
Agricultural groups would be more likely to use grassroots lobbying methods.

content.answer: Agricultural groups would be less independent from the state.

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain how the implications of the author's argument or perspective may affect political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
